title: ‘Now We Have Two Cards to Play’: Here’s What’s Next as Sepp Kuss Kicks Off 2024
content:
The Vuelta a España champion returns to action with a pair of one-days and the Volta ao Algarve: 'That Vuelta victory did something to him. He gained so much confidence.'

Read the full article at ‘Now We Have Two Cards to Play’: Here’s What’s Next as Sepp Kuss Kicks Off 2024 on Velo.
author: ahood
